text: TRANSACTION ABORT Aborting a txn is actually a special case of the ARIES undo operation applied to only one transaction. We need to add another field to our log records: : The previous LSN for the txn. » This maintains a linked-list for each txn that makes it easy to walk through its records | £2CMU-08 IM » PI % 20:19/1:18:06 - NORMAL EXECUTION > [cc K - ] —El Ll SUS 21- ARIES Database Recovery (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
